channel.title: Good Keyboard Emulator
channel.description: So I am looking for a Keyboard emulator to allow me to make my controler (Xbox 360) work in programs that do not support controllers. I would prefer one that allows for analog input to be assined to keys so I can use the analog sticks, triggers and directional pad on the controler but as long as it works I'm ok I guess. Any recommendations?

item.title: Good Keyboard Emulator
item.dc:creator: FireTime
item.description:
joycur!

It’s super old but still works and is super small. (can be even run in portable mode)

I keep a copy saved in my drop box. - download

Read full topic

item.title: Good Keyboard Emulator
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
i found joystick2mouse to be a pretty good program since it also works on 7 x64, I’m pretty sure it can emulate any button on the keyboard

Read full topic

item.title: Good Keyboard Emulator

item.description:
So I am looking for a Keyboard emulator to allow me to make my controler (Xbox 360) work in programs that do not support controllers.
